statements: SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE clearance_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, absorption_rate FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE dose_amount >= 100 AND dose_frequency = 'daily'
SELECT MAX(plasma_concentration) AS max_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, plasma_concentration, absorption_rate FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE absorption_rate > 0.7 ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT AVG(clearance_rate) AS avg_clearance_rate FROM pharmacokinetic_data
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, dose_amount, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE dose_amount >= 10 ORDER BY drug_name DESC
SELECT drug_name, AVG(plasma_concentration) AS avg_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data GROUP BY drug_name HAVING AVG(plasma_concentration) > 20
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE clearance_rate < 0.5 AND absorption_rate > 0.3 ORDER BY plasma_concentration ASC
SELECT patient_id, SUM(dose_amount) AS total_dose FROM pharmacokinetic_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING SUM(dose_amount) > 50
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM pharmacokinetic_data GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetics_data;
SELECT drug_id, dose, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetics_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT study_group, efficacy_score FROM pharmacodynamics_data WHERE duration_hrs > 24;
SELECT patient_id, dose, timestamp FROM pharmacokinetics_data ORDER BY dose DESC;
SELECT drug_id, MAX(efficacy_score) FROM pharmacodynamics_data GROUP BY drug_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetics_data WHERE dose > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, dose, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetics_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND drug_id = 3 ORDER BY plasma_concentration ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_id, SUM(dose) AS total_dose FROM pharmacokinetics_data GROUP BY drug_id HAVING total_dose > 500 ORDER BY total_dose DESC;
SELECT MAX(efficacy_score) AS max_score, AVG(duration_hrs) AS avg_duration FROM pharmacodynamics_data WHERE study_group='Control';
SELECT drug_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM pharmacokinetics_data UNION SELECT drug_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM pharmacodynamics_data;
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data
SELECT drug_name, time_elapsed_hours, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data ORDER BY time_elapsed_hours DESC
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM pharmacodynamic_data WHERE response_score > 5
SELECT * FROM dosing_regimens WHERE dose_amount > 100 AND max_dose_per_day < 500
SELECT AVG(dose_amount) AS avg_dose FROM dosing_regimens
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE dose_amount > 50 AND time_elapsed_hours < 24 ORDER BY time_elapsed_hours DESC, plasma_concentration ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, drug_name, dose_amount FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE drug_name='Paracetamol' AND time_elapsed_hours BETWEEN 12 AND 36;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(plasma_concentration) AS avg_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(plasma_concentration) > 75;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.drug_name, d.response_score FROM pharmacokinetic_data p JOIN pharmacodynamic_data d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id WHERE d.response_score >= 4 ORDER BY p.patient_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM pharmacokinetic_data GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 2 ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, dose_amount, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, dose_amount FROM dosing_regimens WHERE administration_route = 'Oral';
SELECT * FROM pharmacodynamic_data WHERE efficacy_score > 80;
SELECT drug_name, response_rate FROM drug_efficacy WHERE response_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetic_data ORDER BY plasma_concentration DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, dose_frequency FROM pharmacodynamic_data WHERE efficacy_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM dosing_regimens WHERE administration_route = 'Oral' AND dose_amount > 100;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, response_rate FROM drug_efficacy WHERE efficacy_score BETWEEN 5 AND 8;
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetics
SELECT id, dose, time_interval FROM pharmacokinetics ORDER BY dose DESC
SELECT drug_id, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetics WHERE time_interval < 6
SELECT * FROM dosing_regimens WHERE administration_interval = 12
SELECT patient_id, age, weight FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY weight
SELECT * FROM pharmacokinetics WHERE dose > 50 ORDER BY time_interval DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, drug_id, effect, response FROM pharmacodynamics WHERE response < 0.5 ORDER BY drug_id ASC
SELECT id, regimen_name, dose, administration_interval FROM dosing_regimens WHERE drug_id = 3 AND dose >= 100
SELECT id, patient_id, drug_id, dose, time_interval, plasma_concentration FROM pharmacokinetics WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY plasma_concentration DESC
SELECT id, name, age, weight FROM patients WHERE age >= 50 AND weight < 70 ORDER BY name ASC
